title: Ep. 30 :: The Game Plan for a Brutal Market
itunes:title: The Game Plan for a Brutal Market
description: Dan Ferris, editor of the S&A's Extreme Value, breaks down the fundamentals of the current market. Michael Comeau of Minyanville talks about Apple's new iPhone and Sprint's new HTC rollout.
content:encoded: Dan Ferris, editor of the S&A's Extreme Value, breaks down the fundamentals of the current market. Michael Comeau of Minyanville talks about Apple's new iPhone and Sprint's new HTC rollout.
itunes:subtitle: ​Dan Ferris, editor of the S&A's Extreme Value, breaks down the fundamentals of the current market. Michael Comeau of Minyanville talks about Apple's new iPhone and Sprint's new HTC rollout.
